title: ProBikeKit Easter sale | 15% off all 4iiii power meters, £200 off smart trainers, £145 off Garmin Vector pedals and much more
content:
Excited – sorry, egg-cited – about the coming four-day weekend? Maybe you’re planning to head out on a long ride? Perhaps you’ve got your sights set on a couple of Easter eggs instead?

Whatever your plans, put some time aside to take a look at the Easter weekend offers from ProBikeKit, with some genuinely spectacular deals.

Right now, we’re seeing price drops on products across the likes of Continental’s Grand Prix 5000 tyres, 4iiii power meters, Saris smart trainers and Zipp wheels.

Easter weekend is always a period when we see top-class bike parts and cycling gear on sale, and PBK is certainly leading the way right now, with savings running as high as 40 per cent. Read on for our pick of the best ProBikeKit deals this Easter Weekend.

The best ProBikeKit Easter weekend deals

15% off all 4iiii Power Meters with promo code with POWER15

If you want to start gauging your ride performance, a power meter makes for a wise investment.

4iiii is a well-respected brand and we’re delighted to see they’re all available for 15 per cent less in this sale. All you’ll need to do is enter the promo code POWER15 when you pay at the checkout.

  • Save 15% on all 4iiii Power Meters with promo code with POWER15 at ProBikeKit

£200 off Saris H3 Smart Trainer – £899.99 £699.99

With so many cyclists confined to quarters over the last year, smart trainers have enjoyed a stratospheric surge in popularity.

This model from Saris is built to provide up to 2,000 watts of resistance and can simulate an incline of up to 20 per cent, and will make an excellent investment for anybody training at home. It’s currently on offer for 28 per cent less than usual: that’s an impressive £200 off.

  • Save £200 on the Saris H3 Smart Trainer at ProBikeKit

Garmin Vector 3 dual-sided power meter pedals – £789.99 £644.99

Garmin’s Vector pedal line was recently replaced by its all-new Rally range. As such, there are some pretty juicy deals going on the older pedals, which are still perfectly good.

ProBikeKit is currently offering a very healthy £145 off of RRP for the dual-sided version.

  • Save £145 on Garmin Vector 3 dual-sided power meter pedals

Continental GP5000 tan wall single tyre – £59.99 £54.99

Continental Tyres

The Continental GP5000 tyres enjoy a reputation as one of the best road bike tyres out there. They’re equipped with a legendary Black Chili rubber compound that offers an optimum mix of resistance, durability, grip and protection.

There’s just a modest 8 per cent saving on the tan wall version of the tyre right now, but we always welcome seeing these high-calibre tyres on offer.

  • Save £5 on the GP5000 Tan Wall Single Tyre at ProBikeKit

Up to 20% off all Zipp wheels and free Zipp wheelbag

If you’re looking for wheels that are light, aerodynamic and built to last, then you should definitely take a look at ProBikeKit’s discounts across the Zipp range.

Not only are these wheelsets going for as much as 20 per cent less than usual, you can also pick up a free Zipp wheelbag. We all love a freebie, right?

  • Up to 20% off all Zipp wheels and free Zipp wheelbag at ProBikeKit

Save 15% on all SS21 Clothing

That’s right, you read correctly – all of ProBikeKit’s spring/summer clothing range is currently going for 15 per cent less.

This includes the Castelli Summer Skullcap, Sportful’s NoRain arm covers and the Castelli Foresta Squadra jerseys (pictured above). If you haven’t thought much about what you’re wearing on your rides this summer, now is the time to do it.

  • Save 15% on all SS21 Clothing at ProBikeKit

Cycliq Fly 6 Gen 3 – £199.99 £169.99

Much like car dashcams, cycling cameras can be a sensible addition to your bike, offering you that extra peace of mind should the worst happen on your ride.

The Cycliq Fly 6 uses a smart looping system that means you’ll never run out of storage space on the SD card – and, right now, it’s £25.50 cheaper.

  • Save £30 on the Cycliq FLY 6 Gen 3 at ProBikeKit

Muc-Off Ultimate Bicycle Kit – £75.99 £44.99

If your bike’s in need of a little TLC, take a look at the 40 per cent discount on this all-in-one kit from Muc-Off.

This kit contains everything you’ll need to clean your bike, from a litre of biodegradable bike cleaner to a microfibre cloth. Best of all, it all comes in a storage box, letting you replenish things individually as they run out. Why not pick it up while it’s £18 cheaper?

  • Save £30 on the Muc-Off Ultimate Bicycle Kit at ProBikeKit
author: Matt Breen
